definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Well, it's all down to the Earth's orbit around the sun.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，这全都归结于地球沿着轨道绕太阳公转。

sentences.english: The earth spins around on its axis as it travels around the sun.
sentences.chinese: 地球绕地轴自转的方向和它绕太阳公转的一样。

sentences.english: The revolution of the suction mouth is discovered in the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 转动吸嘴公转是在吸煤实验中发现的。

sentences.english: Most planets orbit in a plane that corresponds to their parent star's equator.
sentences.chinese: 大多数行星都是在与母星赤道一致的平面上公转。

sentences.english: It takes the Earth a year to go around the sun.
sentences.chinese: 比如地球的公转周期为一年。

sentences.english: The earth rotates and moves around the sun , so it is a non - inertial reference system - .
sentences.chinese: 地球既有自转又有公转，所以是非惯性参照系。

definition: perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis
to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
the sidereal year (astronomy)/the year defined in terms of the fixed stars
